name: "Single Stick" Shooter
description:
Controls: WASD to move, arrow keys to throw your stick. Tab to pause.

Twist!

Instead of being a single stick shooter, where you use one stick, this is a "Single Stick" shooter, where you use... one stick!
Collect 75 shinies to win!
Good luck!

Also, please don't lose your stick.

List of Assets:

  • Diagonal walkcycle and runcycle for LPC figures, licensed CC-By-Sa 3.0/GPL 3.0/OGA-BY 3.0 by Wolthera van Hövell tot Westerflier Based on the original LPC walkcycles by Stephen Challener (AKA Redshrike) from the LPC base pack. https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-runcycle-and-diagonal-walkcycle
  • Overaction Game Studio https://opengameart.org/content/wooden-stick
  • Pumpkin monster by Tuomo Untinen https://opengameart.org/content/pumpkin-monster
  • C. Nilsson https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-tree-recolors
  • https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-bar-system-0
  • https://opengameart.org/content/items
  • https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-gui-construction-kit-v10
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-base
  • Music by Cleyton Kauffman - https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman https://opengameart.org/content/mystical-enigmatic-background-music
  • https://opengameart.org/content/3-melee-sounds
